General.Name: Hong Ho Precision Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Hong Ho Precision Textile Co., Ltd. operates as a vertical integrated fabric manufacturer company in Taiwan. The company operates through four segments: Plain Weaving, Trade, Construction, and Others. It engages in the production of textiles through preparation, weaving, outsourcing dyeing and finishing, and outsourcing of finished products; manufacturing and trading of garments; construction business; and leasing of residential and commercial buildings. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 473, Zhongshan South Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 710

1.Name: Yong Lu Chen
